home_section_1_content: تطبيقٌ رَقْمِيٌّ لِتَعْلِيمِ اللُّغَةِ العَرَبِيَّةِ لِلنَّاطِقِينَ بِغَيْرِهَا.
home_section_2_header_s: We designed this method specially for you
home_section_2_header: LEARN, SPEAK, PRACTISE ARABIC IN YOUR DAILY LIFE
home_section_2_header_xs: Perfect academic guidance with a professional teaching.
home_section_2_item_classes: Choose your language needs from six levels
home_section_3_header2: Practice with new content every day enjoy the language of literature and Qur’an
home_section_4_header: YOU CAN PRACTICE AS MUCH AS YOU LIKE.
home_section_4_content: You have enough exercises to to practice listening, reading, writing and speaking.
home_section_5_content: We use videoclasses to explained The theory.
home_section_5_content1: You can start at zero or any other level you choose From Beginner (A1) to Business (C2)..
home_section_6_content1: Speak with students from all over the world.
home_section_6_content2: Practice and improve your Arabic language every day.
home_section_6_content3: Dialogues, news, movies, business, sports, art and culture..
home_section_7_content1: Every day you'll find new content suggestions to learn something new in just a few minutes.
home_section_7_content2: Live classes, videos, podcasts, interviews, articles, etc..
home_section_7_content3: You'll love it, the more you practise, the more passionate about it.
home_section_8_content: Every time you complete a microlesson you'll earn points and will see a record of your progress.
